description: Steve Scalise, the No. 3 Republican in the House of Representatives, was among those wounded when shots were fired in Alexandria, Va.
title: 4 Shot at Baseball Field, Including a Republican Congressman
title_page: 4 Shot at Baseball Field, Including a Republican Congressman - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 8,
One of the people wounded in a shooting at a baseball field in Alexandria, Va., was being taken to a helicopter on Wednesday.
